00045 /* flags for all elements share a common bitfield space */
00046 #define SUBD_SPLIT  1
00047 
00048 #define EDGE_PERCENT    2
00049 
00050 /* I don't think new faces are flagged, currently, but
00051  * better safe than sorry. */
00052 #define FACE_CUSTOMFILL 4
00053 #define ELE_INNER   8
00054 #define ELE_SPLIT   16

00057  * NOTE: beauty has been renamed to flag!
00058  */
00059 
00060 /* generic subdivision rules:
00061  *
00062  * - two selected edges in a face should make a link
00063  *   between them.
00064  *
00065  * - one edge should do, what? make pretty topology, or just
00066  *   split the edge only?
00067  */
00068 
00069 /* connects face with smallest len, which I think should always be correct for
00070  * edge subdivision */
00071 static BMEdge *connect_smallest_face(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2, BMFace **r_nf)
00072 {
00073     BMIter iter, iter2;
00074     BMVert *v;
00075     BMLoop *nl;
00076     BMFace *face, *curf = NULL;
00077 
00078     /* this isn't the best thing in the world.  it doesn't handle cases where there's
00079      * multiple faces yet.  that might require a convexity test to figure out which
00080      * face is "best" and who knows what for non-manifold conditions. */
00081     for (face = BM_iter_new(&iter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_VERT, v1); face; face = BM_iter_step(&iter)) {
00082         for (v = BM_iter_new(&iter2, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_FACE, face); v; v = BM_iter_step(&iter2)) {
00083             if (v == v2) {
00084                 if (!curf || face->len < curf->len) curf = face;
00085             }
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00089     if (curf) {
00090         face = BM_face_split(bm, curf, v1, v2, &nl, NULL, FALSE);
00091         
00092         if (r_nf) *r_nf = face;
00093         return nl ? nl->e : NULL;
00094     }
00095 
00096     return NULL;
00097 }
00098 /* calculates offset for co, based on fractal, sphere or smooth settings  */
00099 static void alter_co(BMesh *bm, BMVert *v, BMEdge *UNUSED(origed), const SubDParams *params, float perc,
00100                      BMVert *vsta, BMVert *vend)
00101 {
00102     float tvec[3], prev_co[3], fac;
00103     float *co = NULL;
00104     int i, totlayer = CustomData_number_of_layers(&bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY);
00105     
00106     BM_vert_normal_update_all(v);
00107 
00108     co = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->vdata, v->head.data, CD_SHAPEKEY, params->origkey);
00109     copy_v3_v3(co, v->co);
00110     copy_v3_v3(prev_co, co);
00111 
00112     if (UNLIKELY(params->use_sphere)) { /* subdivide sphere */
00113         normalize_v3(co);
00114         mul_v3_fl(co, params->smooth);
00115     }
00116     else if (params->use_smooth) {
00117         /* we calculate an offset vector vec1[], to be added to *co */
00118         float len, nor[3], nor1[3], nor2[3], smooth = params->smooth;
00119 
00120         sub_v3_v3v3(nor, vsta->co, vend->co);
00121         len = 0.5f * normalize_v3(nor);
00122 
00123         copy_v3_v3(nor1, vsta->no);
00124         copy_v3_v3(nor2, vend->no);
00125 
00126         /* cosine angle */
00127         fac = dot_v3v3(nor, nor1);
00128         mul_v3_v3fl(tvec, nor1, fac);
00129 
00130         /* cosine angle */
00131         fac = -dot_v3v3(nor, nor2);
00132         madd_v3_v3fl(tvec, nor2, fac);
00133 
00134         /* falloff for multi subdivide */
00135         smooth *= sqrtf(fabsf(1.0f - 2.0f * fabsf(0.5f-perc)));
00136 
00137         mul_v3_fl(tvec, smooth * len);
00138 
00139         add_v3_v3(co, tvec);
00140     }
00141 
00142     if (params->use_fractal) {
00143         float len = len_v3v3(vsta->co, vend->co);
00144         float vec2[3] = {0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f}, co2[3];
00145 
00146         fac = params->fractal * len;
00147 
00148         add_v3_v3(vec2, vsta->no);
00149         add_v3_v3(vec2, vend->no);
00150         mul_v3_fl(vec2, 0.5f);
00151 
00152         add_v3_v3v3(co2, v->co, params->off);
00153         tvec[0] = fac * (BLI_gTurbulence(1.0, co2[0], co2[1], co2[2], 15, 0, 1) - 0.5f);
00154         tvec[1] = fac * (BLI_gTurbulence(1.0, co2[0], co2[1], co2[2], 15, 0, 1) - 0.5f);
00155         tvec[2] = fac * (BLI_gTurbulence(1.0, co2[0], co2[1], co2[2], 15, 0, 1) - 0.5f);
00156 
00157         mul_v3_v3(vec2, tvec);
00158 
00159         /* add displacement */
00160         add_v3_v3v3(co, co, vec2);
00161     }
00162 
00163     /* apply the new difference to the rest of the shape keys,
00164      * note that this doent take rotations into account, we _could_ support
00165      * this by getting the normals and coords for each shape key and
00166      * re-calculate the smooth value for each but this is quite involved.
00167      * for now its ok to simply apply the difference IMHO - campbell */
00168     sub_v3_v3v3(tvec, prev_co, co);
00169 
00170     for (i = 0; i < totlayer; i++) {
00171         if (params->origkey != i) {
00172             co = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->vdata, v->head.data, CD_SHAPEKEY, i);
00173             sub_v3_v3(co, tvec);
00174         }
00175     }
00176 
00177 }
00178 
00179 /* assumes in the edge is the correct interpolated vertices already */
00180 /* percent defines the interpolation, rad and flag are for special options */
00181 /* results in new vertex with correct coordinate, vertex normal and weight group info */
00182 static BMVert *bm_subdivide_edge_addvert(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *edge, BMEdge *oedge,
00183                                          const SubDParams *params, float percent,
00184                                          float percent2,
00185                                          BMEdge **out, BMVert *vsta, BMVert *vend)
00186 {
00187     BMVert *ev;
00188     
00189     ev = BM_edge_split(bm, edge, edge->v1, out, percent);
00190 
00191     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, ev, ELE_INNER);
00192 
00193     /* offset for smooth or sphere or fractal */
00194     alter_co(bm, ev, oedge, params, percent2, vsta, vend);
00195 
00196 #if 0 //BMESH_TODO
00197     /* clip if needed by mirror modifier */
00198     if (edge->v1->f2) {
00199         if (edge->v1->f2 & edge->v2->f2 & 1) {
00200             co[0] = 0.0f;
00201         }
00202         if (edge->v1->f2 & edge->v2->f2 & 2) {
00203             co[1] = 0.0f;
00204         }
00205         if (edge->v1->f2 & edge->v2->f2 & 4) {
00206             co[2] = 0.0f;
00207         }
00208     }
00209 #endif
00210     
00211     interp_v3_v3v3(ev->no, vsta->no, vend->no, percent2);
00212     normalize_v3(ev->no);
00213 
00214     return ev;
00215 }
00216 
00217 static BMVert *subdivideedgenum(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *edge, BMEdge *oedge,
00218                                 int curpoint, int totpoint, const SubDParams *params,
00219                                 BMEdge **newe, BMVert *vsta, BMVert *vend)
00220 {
00221     BMVert *ev;
00222     float percent, percent2 = 0.0f;
00223 
00224     if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, edge, EDGE_PERCENT) && totpoint == 1)
00225         percent = BMO_slot_map_float_get(bm, params->op, "edgepercents", edge);
00226     else {
00227         percent = 1.0f / (float)(totpoint + 1-curpoint);
00228         percent2 = (float)(curpoint + 1) / (float)(totpoint + 1);
00229 
00230     }
00231     
00232     ev = bm_subdivide_edge_addvert(bm, edge, oedge, params, percent,
00233                                    percent2, newe, vsta, vend);
00234     return ev;
00235 }
00236 
00237 static void bm_subdivide_multicut(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *edge, const SubDParams *params,
00238                                   BMVert *vsta, BMVert *vend)
00239 {
00240     BMEdge *eed = edge, *newe, temp = *edge;
00241     BMVert *v, ov1 = *edge->v1, ov2 = *edge->v2, *v1 = edge->v1, *v2 = edge->v2;
00242     int i, numcuts = params->numcuts;
00243 
00244     temp.v1 = &ov1;
00245     temp.v2 = &ov2;
00246     
00247     for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00248         v = subdivideedgenum(bm, eed, &temp, i, params->numcuts, params, &newe, vsta, vend);
00249 
00250         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, SUBD_SPLIT);
00251         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, eed, SUBD_SPLIT);
00252         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, newe, SUBD_SPLIT);
00253 
00254         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, v, ELE_SPLIT);
00255         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, eed, ELE_SPLIT);
00256         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, newe, SUBD_SPLIT);
00257 
00258         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(v);
00259         if (v->e) BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(v->e);
00260         if (v->e && v->e->l) BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(v->e->l->f);
00261     }
00262     
00263     alter_co(bm, v1, &temp, params, 0, &ov1, &ov2);
00264     alter_co(bm, v2, &temp, params, 1.0, &ov1, &ov2);
00265 }
00266 
00267 /* note: the patterns are rotated as necessary to
00268  * match the input geometry.  they're based on the
00269  * pre-split state of the  face */
00270 
00271 /*
00272  *  v3---------v2
00273  *  |          |
00274  *  |          |
00275  *  |          |
00276  *  |          |
00277  *  v4---v0---v1
00278  */
00279 static void quad_1edge_split(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(face),
00280                              BMVert **verts, const SubDParams *params)
00281 {
00282     BMFace *nf;
00283     int i, add, numcuts = params->numcuts;
00284 
00285     /* if it's odd, the middle face is a quad, otherwise it's a triangle */
00286     if ((numcuts % 2) == 0) {
00287         add = 2;
00288         for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00289             if (i == numcuts / 2) {
00290                 add -= 1;
00291             }
00292             connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[i], verts[numcuts + add], &nf);
00293         }
00294     }
00295     else {
00296         add = 2;
00297         for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00298             connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[i], verts[numcuts + add], &nf);
00299             if (i == numcuts / 2) {
00300                 add -= 1;
00301                 connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[i], verts[numcuts + add], &nf);
00302             }
00303         }
00304 
00305     }
00306 }
00307 
00308 static SubDPattern quad_1edge = {
00309     {1, 0, 0, 0},
00310     quad_1edge_split,
00311     4,
00312 };
00313 
00314 
00315 /*
00316  *  v6--------v5
00317  *  |          |
00318  *  |          |v4s
00319  *  |          |v3s
00320  *  |   s  s   |
00321  *  v7-v0--v1-v2
00322  */
00323 static void quad_2edge_split_path(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(face), BMVert **verts,
00324                                   const SubDParams *params)
00325 {
00326     BMFace *nf;
00327     int i, numcuts = params->numcuts;
00328     
00329     for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00330         connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[i], verts[numcuts + (numcuts - i)], &nf);
00331     }
00332     connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[numcuts * 2 + 3], verts[numcuts * 2 + 1], &nf);
00333 }
00334 
00335 static SubDPattern quad_2edge_path = {
00336     {1, 1, 0, 0},
00337     quad_2edge_split_path,
00338     4,
00339 };
00340 
00341 /*
00342  *  v6--------v5
00343  *  |          |
00344  *  |          |v4s
00345  *  |          |v3s
00346  *  |   s  s   |
00347  *  v7-v0--v1-v2
00348  */
00349 static void quad_2edge_split_innervert(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(face), BMVert **verts,
00350                                        const SubDParams *params)
00351 {
00352     BMFace *nf;
00353     BMVert *v, *lastv;
00354     BMEdge *e, *ne, olde;
00355     int i, numcuts = params->numcuts;
00356     
00357     lastv = verts[numcuts];
00358 
00359     for (i = numcuts - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
00360         e = connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[i], verts[numcuts + (numcuts - i)], &nf);
00361 
00362         olde = *e;
00363         v = bm_subdivide_edge_addvert(bm, e, &olde, params, 0.5f, 0.5f, &ne, e->v1, e->v2);
00364 
00365         if (i != numcuts - 1) {
00366             connect_smallest_face(bm, lastv, v, &nf);
00367         }
00368 
00369         lastv = v;
00370     }
00371 
00372     connect_smallest_face(bm, lastv, verts[numcuts * 2 + 2], &nf);
00373 }
00374 
00375 static SubDPattern quad_2edge_innervert = {
00376     {1, 1, 0, 0},
00377     quad_2edge_split_innervert,
00378     4,
00379 };
00380 
00381 /*
00382  *  v6--------v5
00383  *  |          |
00384  *  |          |v4s
00385  *  |          |v3s
00386  *  |   s  s   |
00387  *  v7-v0--v1-v2
00388  *
00389  */
00390 static void quad_2edge_split_fan(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(face), BMVert **verts,
00391                                  const SubDParams *params)
00392 {
00393     BMFace *nf;
00394     /* BMVert *v; */               /* UNUSED */
00395     /* BMVert *lastv = verts[2]; */ /* UNUSED */
00396     /* BMEdge *e, *ne; */          /* UNUSED */
00397     int i, numcuts = params->numcuts;
00398 
00399     for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00400         connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[i], verts[numcuts * 2 + 2], &nf);
00401         connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[numcuts + (numcuts - i)], verts[numcuts * 2 + 2], &nf);
00402     }
00403 }
00404 
00405 static SubDPattern quad_2edge_fan = {
00406     {1, 1, 0, 0},
00407     quad_2edge_split_fan,
00408     4,
00409 };
00410 
00411 /*
00412  *      s   s
00413  *  v8--v7--v6-v5
00414  *  |          |
00415  *  |          v4 s
00416  *  |          |
00417  *  |          v3 s
00418  *  |   s  s   |
00419  *  v9-v0--v1-v2
00420  */
00421 static void quad_3edge_split(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(face), BMVert **verts,
00422                              const SubDParams *params)
00423 {
00424     BMFace *nf;
00425     int i, add = 0, numcuts = params->numcuts;
00426     
00427     for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00428         if (i == numcuts / 2) {
00429             if (numcuts % 2 != 0) {
00430                 connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[numcuts - i - 1 + add], verts[i + numcuts + 1], &nf);
00431             }
00432             add = numcuts * 2 + 2;
00433         }
00434         connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[numcuts - i - 1 + add], verts[i + numcuts + 1], &nf);
00435     }
00436 
00437     for (i = 0; i < numcuts / 2 + 1; i++) {
00438         connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[i], verts[(numcuts - i) + numcuts * 2 + 1], &nf);
00439     }
00440 }
00441 
00442 static SubDPattern quad_3edge = {
00443     {1, 1, 1, 0},
00444     quad_3edge_split,
00445     4,
00446 };
00447 
00448 /*
00449  *            v8--v7-v6--v5
00450  *            |     s    |
00451  *            |v9 s     s|v4
00452  * first line |          |   last line
00453  *            |v10s s   s|v3
00454  *            v11-v0--v1-v2
00455  *
00456  *            it goes from bottom up
00457  */
00458 static void quad_4edge_subdivide(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(face), BMVert **verts,
00459                                  const SubDParams *params)
00460 {
00461     BMFace *nf;
00462     BMVert *v, *v1, *v2;
00463     BMEdge *e, *ne, temp;
00464     BMVert **lines;
00465     int numcuts = params->numcuts;
00466     int i, j, a, b, s = numcuts + 2 /* , totv = numcuts * 4 + 4 */;
00467 
00468     lines = MEM_callocN(sizeof(BMVert *) * (numcuts + 2) * (numcuts + 2), "q_4edge_split");
00469     /* build a 2-dimensional array of verts,
00470      * containing every vert (and all new ones)
00471      * in the face */
00472 
00473     /* first line */
00474     for (i = 0; i < numcuts + 2; i++) {
00475         lines[i] = verts[numcuts * 3 + 2 + (numcuts - i + 1)];
00476     }
00477 
00478     /* last line */
00479     for (i = 0; i < numcuts + 2; i++) {
00480         lines[(s - 1) * s + i] = verts[numcuts + i];
00481     }
00482     
00483     /* first and last members of middle lines */
00484     for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00485         a = i;
00486         b = numcuts + 1 + numcuts + 1 + (numcuts - i - 1);
00487         
00488         e = connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[a], verts[b], &nf);
00489         if (!e)
00490             continue;
00491 
00492         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_INNER);
00493         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, nf, ELE_INNER);
00494 
00495         
00496         v1 = lines[(i + 1) * s] = verts[a];
00497         v2 = lines[(i + 1) * s + s - 1] = verts[b];
00498         
00499         temp = *e;
00500         for (a = 0; a < numcuts; a++) {
00501             v = subdivideedgenum(bm, e, &temp, a, numcuts, params, &ne,
00502                                  v1, v2);
00503 
00504             BMESH_ASSERT(v != NULL);
00505 
00506             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, ne, ELE_INNER);
00507             lines[(i + 1) * s + a + 1] = v;
00508         }
00509     }
00510 
00511     for (i = 1; i < numcuts + 2; i++) {
00512         for (j = 1; j < numcuts + 1; j++) {
00513             a = i * s + j;
00514             b = (i - 1) * s + j;
00515             e = connect_smallest_face(bm, lines[a], lines[b], &nf);
00516             if (!e)
00517                 continue;
00518 
00519             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_INNER);
00520             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, nf, ELE_INNER);
00521         }
00522     }
00523 
00524     MEM_freeN(lines);
00525 }
00526 
00527 /*
00528  *        v3
00529  *       / \
00530  *      /   \
00531  *     /     \
00532  *    /       \
00533  *   /         \
00534  *  v4--v0--v1--v2
00535  *      s    s
00536  */
00537 static void tri_1edge_split(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(face), BMVert **verts,
00538                             const SubDParams *params)
00539 {
00540     BMFace *nf;
00541     int i, numcuts = params->numcuts;
00542     
00543     for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00544         connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[i], verts[numcuts + 1], &nf);
00545     }
00546 }
00547 
00548 static SubDPattern tri_1edge = {
00549     {1, 0, 0},
00550     tri_1edge_split,
00551     3,
00552 };
00553 
00554 /*         v5
00555  *        / \
00556  *   s v6/---\ v4 s
00557  *      / \ / \
00558  *  sv7/---v---\ v3 s
00559  *    /  \/  \/ \
00560  *   v8--v0--v1--v2
00561  *      s    s
00562  */
00563 static void tri_3edge_subdivide(BMesh *bm, BMFace *UNUSED(face), BMVert **verts,
00564                                 const SubDParams *params)
00565 {
00566     BMFace *nf;
00567     BMEdge *e, *ne, temp;
00568     BMVert ***lines, *v, ov1, ov2;
00569     void *stackarr[1];
00570     int i, j, a, b, numcuts = params->numcuts;
00571     
00572     /* number of verts in each lin */
00573     lines = MEM_callocN(sizeof(void *) * (numcuts + 2), "triangle vert table");
00574     
00575     lines[0] = (BMVert **) stackarr;
00576     lines[0][0] = verts[numcuts * 2 + 1];
00577     
00578     lines[numcuts + 1] = MEM_callocN(sizeof(void *) * (numcuts + 2), "triangle vert table 2");
00579     for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00580         lines[numcuts + 1][i + 1] = verts[i];
00581     }
00582     lines[numcuts + 1][0] = verts[numcuts * 3 + 2];
00583     lines[numcuts + 1][numcuts + 1] = verts[numcuts];
00584 
00585     for (i = 0; i < numcuts; i++) {
00586         lines[i + 1] = MEM_callocN(sizeof(void *) * (2 + i), "triangle vert table row");
00587         a = numcuts * 2 + 2 + i;
00588         b = numcuts + numcuts - i;
00589         e = connect_smallest_face(bm, verts[a], verts[b], &nf);
00590         if (!e) goto cleanup;
00591 
00592         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_INNER);
00593         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, nf, ELE_INNER);
00594 
00595         lines[i + 1][0] = verts[a];
00596         lines[i + 1][i + 1] = verts[b];
00597         
00598         temp = *e;
00599         ov1 = *verts[a];
00600         ov2 = *verts[b];
00601         temp.v1 = &ov1;
00602         temp.v2 = &ov2;
00603         for (j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00604             v = subdivideedgenum(bm, e, &temp, j, i, params, &ne,
00605                                  verts[a], verts[b]);
00606             lines[i + 1][j + 1] = v;
00607 
00608             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, ne, ELE_INNER);
00609         }
00610     }
00611     
00612     /*
00613      *         v5
00614      *        / \
00615      *   s v6/---\ v4 s
00616      *      / \ / \
00617      *  sv7/---v---\ v3 s
00618      *    /  \/  \/ \
00619      *   v8--v0--v1--v2
00620      *      s    s
00621      */
00622     for (i = 1; i < numcuts + 1; i++) {
00623         for (j = 0; j < i; j++) {
00624             e = connect_smallest_face(bm, lines[i][j], lines[i + 1][j + 1], &nf);
00625 
00626             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_INNER);
00627             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, nf, ELE_INNER);
00628 
00629             e = connect_smallest_face(bm, lines[i][j + 1], lines[i + 1][j + 1], &nf);
00630 
00631             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, ELE_INNER);
00632             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, nf, ELE_INNER);
00633         }
00634     }
00635 
00636 cleanup:
00637     for (i = 1; i < numcuts + 2; i++) {
00638         if (lines[i]) MEM_freeN(lines[i]);
00639     }
00640 
00641     MEM_freeN(lines);
00642 }
00643 
00644 static SubDPattern tri_3edge = {
00645     {1, 1, 1},
00646     tri_3edge_subdivide,
00647     3,
00648 };
00649 
00650 
00651 static SubDPattern quad_4edge = {
00652     {1, 1, 1, 1},
00653     quad_4edge_subdivide,
00654     4,
00655 };
00656 
00657 static SubDPattern *patterns[] = {
00658     NULL, //quad single edge pattern is inserted here
00659     NULL, //quad corner vert pattern is inserted here
00660     NULL, //tri single edge pattern is inserted here
00661     NULL,
00662     &quad_3edge,
00663     NULL,
00664 };
00665 
00666 #define PLEN  (sizeof(patterns) / sizeof(void *))
00667 
00668 typedef struct SubDFaceData {
00669     BMVert *start; SubDPattern *pat;
00670     int totedgesel; //only used if pat was NULL, e.g. no pattern was found
00671     BMFace *face;
00672 } SubDFaceData;
00673 
00674 void bmo_esubd_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00675 {
00676     BMOpSlot *einput;
00677     SubDPattern *pat;
00678     SubDParams params;
00679     SubDFaceData *facedata = NULL;
00680     BMIter viter, fiter, liter;
00681     BMVert *v, **verts = NULL;
00682     BMEdge *edge, **edges = NULL;
00683     BMLoop *nl, *l, **splits = NULL, **loops = NULL;
00684     BMFace *face;
00685     BLI_array_declare(splits);
00686     BLI_array_declare(loops);
00687     BLI_array_declare(facedata);
00688     BLI_array_declare(edges);
00689     BLI_array_declare(verts);
00690     float smooth, fractal;
00691     int use_sphere, cornertype, use_singleedge, use_gridfill;
00692     int skey, seed, i, j, matched, a, b, numcuts, totesel;
00693     
00694     BMO_slot_buffer_flag_enable(bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE, SUBD_SPLIT);
00695     
00696     numcuts = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "numcuts");
00697     seed = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "seed");
00698     smooth = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "smooth");
00699     fractal = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "fractal");
00700     cornertype = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "quadcornertype");
00701 
00702     use_singleedge = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_singleedge");
00703     use_gridfill   = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_gridfill");
00704     use_sphere     = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "use_sphere");
00705     
00706     BLI_srandom(seed);
00707     
00708     patterns[1] = NULL;
00709     //straight cut is patterns[1] == NULL
00710     switch (cornertype) {
00711         case SUBD_PATH:
00712             patterns[1] = &quad_2edge_path;
00713             break;
00714         case SUBD_INNERVERT:
00715             patterns[1] = &quad_2edge_innervert;
00716             break;
00717         case SUBD_FAN:
00718             patterns[1] = &quad_2edge_fan;
00719             break;
00720     }
00721     
00722     if (use_singleedge) {
00723         patterns[0] = &quad_1edge;
00724         patterns[2] = &tri_1edge;
00725     }
00726     else {
00727         patterns[0] = NULL;
00728         patterns[2] = NULL;
00729     }
00730 
00731     if (use_gridfill) {
00732         patterns[3] = &quad_4edge;
00733         patterns[5] = &tri_3edge;
00734     }
00735     else {
00736         patterns[3] = NULL;
00737         patterns[5] = NULL;
00738     }
00739     
00740     /* add a temporary shapekey layer to store displacements on current geometry */
00741     BM_data_layer_add(bm, &bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY);
00742     skey = CustomData_number_of_layers(&bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY) - 1;
00743     
00744     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00745         float *co = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->vdata, v->head.data, CD_SHAPEKEY, skey);
00746         copy_v3_v3(co, v->co);
00747     }
00748 
00749     /* first go through and tag edges */
00750     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE, SUBD_SPLIT);
00751 
00752     params.numcuts = numcuts;
00753     params.op = op;
00754     params.smooth = smooth;
00755     params.seed = seed;
00756     params.fractal = fractal;
00757     params.use_smooth  = (smooth  != 0.0f);
00758     params.use_fractal = (fractal != 0.0f);
00759     params.use_sphere  = use_sphere;
00760     params.origkey = skey;
00761     params.off[0] = (float)BLI_drand() * 200.0f;
00762     params.off[1] = (float)BLI_drand() * 200.0f;
00763     params.off[2] = (float)BLI_drand() * 200.0f;
00764     
00765     BMO_slot_map_to_flag(bm, op, "custompatterns",
00766                          BM_FACE, FACE_CUSTOMFILL);
00767 
00768     BMO_slot_map_to_flag(bm, op, "edgepercents",
00769                          BM_EDGE, EDGE_PERCENT);
00770 
00771 
00772     BM_ITER_MESH (face, &fiter, bm, BM_FACES_OF_MESH) {
00773         BMEdge *e1 = NULL, *e2 = NULL;
00774         float vec1[3], vec2[3];
00775 
00776         /* figure out which pattern to use */
00777 
00778         BLI_array_empty(edges);
00779         BLI_array_empty(verts);
00780 
00781         BLI_array_growitems(edges, face->len);
00782         BLI_array_growitems(verts, face->len);
00783 
00784         matched = 0;
00785 
00786         totesel = 0;
00787         BM_ITER_ELEM_INDEX (nl, &liter, face, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, i) {
00788             edges[i] = nl->e;
00789             verts[i] = nl->v;
00790 
00791             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, edges[i], SUBD_SPLIT)) {
00792                 if (!e1) e1 = edges[i];
00793                 else     e2 = edges[i];
00794 
00795                 totesel++;
00796             }
00797         }
00798 
00799         /* make sure the two edges have a valid angle to each other */
00800         if (totesel == 2 && BM_edge_share_vert_count(e1, e2)) {
00801             float angle;
00802 
00803             sub_v3_v3v3(vec1, e1->v2->co, e1->v1->co);
00804             sub_v3_v3v3(vec2, e2->v2->co, e2->v1->co);
00805             normalize_v3(vec1);
00806             normalize_v3(vec2);
00807 
00808             angle = dot_v3v3(vec1, vec2);
00809             angle = fabsf(angle);
00810             if (fabsf(angle - 1.0f) < 0.01f) {
00811                 totesel = 0;
00812             }
00813         }
00814 
00815         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, face, FACE_CUSTOMFILL)) {
00816             pat = BMO_slot_map_data_get(bm, op,
00817                                         "custompatterns", face);
00818             for (i = 0; i < pat->len; i++) {
00819                 matched = 1;
00820                 for (j = 0; j < pat->len; j++) {
00821                     a = (j + i) % pat->len;
00822                     if ((!!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, edges[a], SUBD_SPLIT)) != (!!pat->seledges[j])) {
00823                         matched = 0;
00824                         break;
00825                     }
00826                 }
00827                 if (matched) {
00828                     BLI_array_growone(facedata);
00829                     b = BLI_array_count(facedata) - 1;
00830                     facedata[b].pat = pat;
00831                     facedata[b].start = verts[i];
00832                     facedata[b].face = face;
00833                     facedata[b].totedgesel = totesel;
00834                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, face, SUBD_SPLIT);
00835                     break;
00836                 }
00837             }
00838 
00839             /* obvously don't test for other patterns matching */
00840             continue;
00841         }
00842 
00843         for (i = 0; i < PLEN; i++) {
00844             pat = patterns[i];
00845             if (!pat) {
00846                 continue;
00847             }
00848 
00849             if (pat->len == face->len) {
00850                 for (a = 0; a < pat->len; a++) {
00851                     matched = 1;
00852                     for (b = 0; b < pat->len; b++) {
00853                         j = (b + a) % pat->len;
00854                         if ((!!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, edges[j], SUBD_SPLIT)) != (!!pat->seledges[b])) {
00855                             matched = 0;
00856                             break;
00857                         }
00858                     }
00859                     if (matched) {
00860                         break;
00861                     }
00862                 }
00863                 if (matched) {
00864                     BLI_array_growone(facedata);
00865                     j = BLI_array_count(facedata) - 1;
00866 
00867                     BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, face, SUBD_SPLIT);
00868 
00869                     facedata[j].pat = pat;
00870                     facedata[j].start = verts[a];
00871                     facedata[j].face = face;
00872                     facedata[j].totedgesel = totesel;
00873                     break;
00874                 }
00875             }
00876 
00877         }
00878         
00879         if (!matched && totesel) {
00880             BLI_array_growone(facedata);
00881             j = BLI_array_count(facedata) - 1;
00882             
00883             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, face, SUBD_SPLIT);
00884             facedata[j].totedgesel = totesel;
00885             facedata[j].face = face;
00886         }
00887     }
00888 
00889     einput = BMO_slot_get(op, "edges");
00890 
00891     /* go through and split edges */
00892     for (i = 0; i < einput->len; i++) {
00893         edge = ((BMEdge **)einput->data.p)[i];
00894         bm_subdivide_multicut(bm, edge, &params, edge->v1, edge->v2);
00895     }
00896 
00897     /* copy original-geometry displacements to current coordinates */
00898     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
00899         float *co = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->vdata, v->head.data, CD_SHAPEKEY, skey);
00900         copy_v3_v3(v->co, co);
00901     }
00902 
00903     i = 0;
00904     for (i = 0; i < BLI_array_count(facedata); i++) {
00905         face = facedata[i].face;
00906 
00907         /* figure out which pattern to use */
00908         BLI_array_empty(verts);
00909 
00910         pat = facedata[i].pat;
00911 
00912         if (!pat && facedata[i].totedgesel == 2) {
00913             int vlen;
00914             
00915             /* ok, no pattern.  we still may be able to do something */
00916             BLI_array_empty(loops);
00917             BLI_array_empty(splits);
00918 
00919             /* for case of two edges, connecting them shouldn't be too hard */
00920             BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, face, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00921                 BLI_array_growone(loops);
00922                 loops[BLI_array_count(loops) - 1] = l;
00923             }
00924             
00925             vlen = BLI_array_count(loops);
00926 
00927             /* find the boundary of one of the split edges */
00928             for (a = 1; a < vlen; a++) {
00929                 if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, loops[a - 1]->v, ELE_INNER) &&
00930                     BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, loops[a]->v, ELE_INNER))
00931                 {
00932                     break;
00933                 }
00934             }
00935             
00936             if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, loops[(a + numcuts + 1) % vlen]->v, ELE_INNER)) {
00937                 b = (a + numcuts + 1) % vlen;
00938             }
00939             else {
00940                 /* find the boundary of the other edge. */
00941                 for (j = 0; j < vlen; j++) {
00942                     b = (j + a + numcuts + 1) % vlen;
00943                     if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, loops[b == 0 ? vlen - 1 : b - 1]->v, ELE_INNER) &&
00944                         BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, loops[b]->v, ELE_INNER))
00945                     {
00946                         break;
00947                     }
00948                 }
00949             }
00950             
00951             b += numcuts - 1;
00952 
00953             for (j = 0; j < numcuts; j++) {
00954                 BLI_array_growone(splits);
00955                 splits[BLI_array_count(splits) - 1] = loops[a];
00956                 
00957                 BLI_array_growone(splits);
00958                 splits[BLI_array_count(splits) - 1] = loops[b];
00959 
00960                 b = (b - 1) % vlen;
00961                 a = (a + 1) % vlen;
00962             }
00963             
00964             //BM_face_legal_splits(bmesh, face, splits, BLI_array_count(splits) / 2);
00965 
00966             for (j = 0; j < BLI_array_count(splits) / 2; j++) {
00967                 if (splits[j * 2]) {
00968                     /* BMFace *nf = */ /* UNUSED */
00969                     BM_face_split(bm, face, splits[j * 2]->v, splits[j * 2 + 1]->v, &nl, NULL, FALSE);
00970                 }
00971             }
00972 
00973             continue;
00974         }
00975         else if (!pat) {
00976             continue;
00977         }
00978 
00979         j = a = 0;
00980         for (nl = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, face);
00981              nl;
00982              nl = BM_iter_step(&liter))
00983         {
00984             if (nl->v == facedata[i].start) {
00985                 a = j + 1;
00986                 break;
00987             }
00988             j++;
00989         }
00990 
00991         for (j = 0; j < face->len; j++) {
00992             BLI_array_growone(verts);
00993         }
00994         
00995         j = 0;
00996         for (nl = BM_iter_new(&liter, bm, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE, face); nl; nl = BM_iter_step(&liter)) {
00997             b = (j - a + face->len) % face->len;
00998             verts[b] = nl->v;
00999             j += 1;
01000         }
01001 
01002         BM_CHECK_ELEMENT(face);
01003         pat->connectexec(bm, face, verts, &params);
01004     }
01005 
01006     /* copy original-geometry displacements to current coordinates */
01007     BM_ITER_MESH (v, &viter, bm, BM_VERTS_OF_MESH) {
01008         float *co = CustomData_bmesh_get_n(&bm->vdata, v->head.data, CD_SHAPEKEY, skey);
01009         copy_v3_v3(v->co, co);
01010     }
01011 
01012     BM_data_layer_free_n(bm, &bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY, skey);
01013     
01014     if (facedata) BLI_array_free(facedata);
01015     if (edges) BLI_array_free(edges);
01016     if (verts) BLI_array_free(verts);
01017     BLI_array_free(splits);
01018     BLI_array_free(loops);
01019 
01020     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "outinner", BM_ALL, ELE_INNER);
01021     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "outsplit", BM_ALL, ELE_SPLIT);
01022     
01023     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "geomout", BM_ALL, ELE_INNER|ELE_SPLIT|SUBD_SPLIT);
01024 }
01025 
01026 /* editmesh-emulating function */
01027 void BM_mesh_esubdivide(BMesh *bm, const char edge_hflag,
01028                         float smooth, float fractal,
01029                         int numcuts,
01030                         int seltype, int cornertype,
01031                         const short use_singleedge, const short use_gridfill,
01032                         int seed)
01033 {
01034     BMOperator op;
01035     
01036     /* use_sphere isnt exposed here since its only used for new primitives */
01037     BMO_op_initf(bm, &op,
01038                  "esubd edges=%he "
01039                  "smooth=%f fractal=%f "
01040                  "numcuts=%i "
01041                  "quadcornertype=%i "
01042                  "use_singleedge=%b use_gridfill=%b "
01043                  "seed=%i",
01044                  edge_hflag,
01045                  smooth, fractal,
01046                  numcuts,
01047                  cornertype,
01048                  use_singleedge, use_gridfill,
01049                  seed);
01050     
01051     BMO_op_exec(bm, &op);
01052     
01053     if (seltype == SUBDIV_SELECT_INNER) {
01054         BMOIter iter;
01055         BMElem *ele;
01056 
01057         for (ele = BMO_iter_new(&iter, bm, &op, "outinner", BM_EDGE | BM_VERT); ele; ele = BMO_iter_step(&iter)) {
01058             BM_elem_select_set(bm, ele, TRUE);
01059         }
01060     }
01061     else if (seltype == SUBDIV_SELECT_LOOPCUT) {
01062         BMOIter iter;
01063         BMElem *ele;
01064         
01065         /* deselect input */
01066         BM_mesh_elem_hflag_disable_all(bm, BM_VERT | BM_EDGE | BM_FACE, BM_ELEM_SELECT, FALSE);
01067 
01068         for (ele = BMO_iter_new(&iter, bm, &op, "outinner", BM_EDGE | BM_VERT); ele; ele = BMO_iter_step(&iter)) {
01069             BM_elem_select_set(bm, ele, TRUE);
01070 
01071             if (ele->head.htype == BM_VERT) {
01072                 BMEdge *e;
01073                 BMIter eiter;
01074 
01075                 BM_ITER_ELEM (e, &eiter, ele, BM_EDGES_OF_VERT) {
01076                     if (!BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
01077                          BM_elem_flag_test(e->v1, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
01078                          BM_elem_flag_test(e->v2, BM_ELEM_SELECT))
01079                     {
01080                         BM_edge_select_set(bm, e, TRUE);
01081                     }
01082                     else if (BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SELECT) &&
01083                              (!BM_elem_flag_test(e->v1, BM_ELEM_SELECT) ||
01084                               !BM_elem_flag_test(e->v2, BM_ELEM_SELECT)))
01085                     {
01086                         BM_edge_select_set(bm, e, FALSE);
01087                     }
01088                 }
01089             }
01090         }
01091     }
01092 
01093     BMO_op_finish(bm, &op);
01094 }
01095 
01096 void bmo_edgebisect_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
01097 {
01098     BMOIter siter;
01099     BMEdge *e;
01100     SubDParams params = {0};
01101     int skey;
01102     
01103     params.numcuts = BMO_slot_int_get(op, "numcuts");
01104     params.op = op;
01105     
01106     BM_data_layer_add(bm, &bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY);
01107     skey = CustomData_number_of_layers(&bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY) - 1;
01108     
01109     params.origkey = skey;
01110 
01111     /* go through and split edges */
01112     BMO_ITER (e, &siter, bm, op, "edges", BM_EDGE) {
01113         bm_subdivide_multicut(bm, e, &params, e->v1, e->v2);
01114     }
01115 
01116     BMO_slot_buffer_from_enabled_flag(bm, op, "outsplit", BM_ALL, ELE_SPLIT);
01117 
01118     BM_data_layer_free_n(bm, &bm->vdata, CD_SHAPEKEY, skey);
01119 }
